thread.title: Paul Pogba and Jesse Lingard reveal their VERY elaborate new goal celebration in Man United changing room
thread.title_full: Paul Pogba and Jesse Lingard reveal their VERY elaborate new goal celebration in Man United changing room

author: Jake Polden
title: Paul Pogba and Jesse Lingard reveal their VERY elaborate new goal celebration in Man United changing room
text:
Sport Paul Pogba and Jesse Lingard reveal their VERY elaborate new goal celebration in Man United changing room The Red Devils pair have been putting the hours in perfecting this goals celebration and have this to show for it... Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Pogba and Lingard's new handshake routine Share this video Get Manchester United FC updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
It's a frantic day what with transfers coming in and out and a full set of Premier League fixtures. 
But two people who aren't feeling the strain are Manchester United duo Paul Pogba and Jesse Lingard, as the above video shows. 
In the clip, the duo show off what they've been working on recently. 
No, it's not a free-kick routine - good guess though - nor is it anything that's really going to be of benefit to the club. 
It is of course a goals celebration. Here it is ladies and gentlemen (Photo: Instagram/paulpogba) The Man United pair strut their stuff (Photo: Instagram/paulpogba) 
United are playing Hull City tomorrow and the midfielders are therefore a little more relaxed than some other people in the world of football. 
Instead of mentally preparing for a fixture, they've spent the day perfecting their latest celebration that typically features some rather elaborate dance moves. 
Lingard gets the ball rolling - no pun intended - with some up-close camera work before Pogba graces the lens with a few moves. Now that's how you celebrate a goal (Photo: Instagram/paulpogba) The king of dance (Photo: Instagram/paulpogba) 
The pair then greet each other in the middle of the changing room and perform a fancy handshake before Lingard dances away from his teammate. 
Pogba posted the clip to Instagram, along with the caption: "Having fun with my bro new celebration." 
Oh, the life of a professional footballer, eh? Follow all the action from transfer deadline day here. Read More
